definition: surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Tornadoes are most frequently reported east of the Rocky Mountains during spring and summer months.
sentences.chinese: 飓风大部份是在春季及夏季发生在洛矶山脉东方。

sentences.english: The painting catches the beauty of the Rockies perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画完美地再现了洛矶山脉之美。

sentences.english: But the basic land based models can only hit North American targets west of the Rocky mountains.
sentences.chinese: 但是基本陆基型只能打击洛矶山脉西面的北美目标。

sentences.english: New mines are being planned for the Rockies and the Pacific Northwest.
sentences.chinese: 美国洛矶山和西北部的新矿山也正在筹划之中。

sentences.english: Which mountain range formsaborder between Alberta and British ColumbiaThe Rocky Mountain range formsaborder between Alberta and British Columbia.
sentences.chinese: 哪一个山脉成为亚伯达省与卑诗省的边界洛矶山脉。

definition: Rocky Mountains/also written 洛磯山|洛矶山
Rocky Mountains in West US and Canada
